sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getComment } from '../../Redux/action' import uuidv4 from 'uuid' import Navbar from '../Common/Navbar' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' class ViewTicket extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } componentDidMount = () => { const {getComment, match} = this.props getComment(match.params.id) } render() { const { allUserTicket, getComments, match } = this.props const data = allUserTicket.find(item => item.id === Number(match.params.id)) console.log(data) console.log(getComment) return ( <>
Ticket Information
{data.title}

Company Name : {data.company}

Status : {data.status} Category : {data.category}
Bootstrap 11 mins ago
Hello, world! This is a toast message.
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ allUserTicket: state.allUserTicket, getComments: state.getComments }); const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ getComment: payload => dispatch(getComment(payload)) }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps )(ViewTicket);
